data.subTitle: Aspiring MERN stack developer with practical experience in building full-stack applications.
aboutDescription: Hello! I'm Janani Priya, a passionate full-stack web developer based in Coimbatore, India.
With a strong foundation in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP, and the MERN stack, I've crafted dynamic and responsive web applications.
I've gained hands-on experience through internships and projects, working with frameworks like React.js, Next.js,Node.js and integrating REST APIs.
Currently pursuing my Master of Computer Applications at Bharathiar University, I'm expanding my expertise in advanced web technologies.
Beyond coding, I enjoy combining design and development to create user-friendly digital experiences.
I've contributed to projects like HR management systems, college event platforms, and academy websites, all focused on real-world problem-solving.
If you're interested in collaborating or exploring my work, check out my portfolio below. Let's connect!

projects.description: Blackstone Infomatics is a digital services company based in Coimbatore, Tamil Nadu, India, specializing in a comprehensive range of solutions to enhance your business's online presence. Their offerings include web design and development, software and mobile app development, search engine optimization (SEO), digital marketing, graphic design, customer relationship management (CRM), and human resource management (HRM) systems.

Developed a dynamic website for a Quran and Arabic Language Academy using Next.js.Integrated a user-friendly interface to enhance accessibility for students and instructors.Implemented a structured curriculum section, allowing easy navigation through courses. Optimized performance for faster load times and seamless user experience.

Developed a comprehensive ERP solution for managing student records, staff details, courses, and financial operations, improving administrative efficiency. Built a responsive and dynamic front-end using Next.js, integrated with Node.js back-end APIs for seamless data flow and performance optimization. Designed and implemented a secure MongoDB database structure, ensuring scalable data storage and retrieval for thousands of records. Enhanced user experience with a modern interface built using Tailwind CSS and ensured secure multi-user access through role-based access control (RBAC).
